API_SECRET.description: This must match the API Token password from PredictBGL, at https://www.managebgl.com/settings-sharing-third

WEBSITE_HOSTNAME.description: Not needed - always points to managebgl.com. Do not include http:// or https://

maxCount.description: OPTIONAL: The maximum number of records to fetch per update.  Default: 1

minutes.description: OPTIONAL: The time window to search for new data per update.  Default: 1440 (one day in minutes)

SHARE_INTERVAL.description: OPTIONAL: The time to wait between each update.  Deault: 150000 (2.5 minutes in milliseconds)
